title: The American Revolution's effect in Europe

content.prompt: The American Revolution played a major role in European history because it

choices.label: led Spain to repudiate its alliances with France and Great Britain
created a new balance of power in favor of Great Britain
precipitated the French fiscal crisis that led to the calling of the Estates-General

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
